name: FLOOR Level-Editor
content:
The actual FLOOR Level-Editor

This piece of software allows YOU to create YOUR custom stories with SCUFF without needing to know how to program a .json file!

name: Introduction to the SCUFF Engine
content:
Introduction to the SCUFF Engine.

This short demonstration shows most of the capabilities of the SCUFF Engine.

You'll follow the main character Helen (currently replaced by Kat from the game Gravity-Rush) trough their adventrues with the SCUFF Egine

name: Introduction to the FLOOR Level-Editor
content:
Introduction to the FLOOR Level-Editor

This short overview shows most of what the FLOOR level editor is capable of, what it is and how to use it.

name: Bug reporter
content: Bug reporter for both SCUFF Engine and FLOOR Level-editor
